headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Inch by Inch
content:
Last week marked the return of several fan-favorite modes, including Sumo, Keep the Pace, Offense Defense, and Inch by Inch. We’re celebrating the latter this week by offering up Double Rewards to all players who brave the Inch by Inch gauntlet: retrieve and deliver the Package while somehow evading a hail of hot lead raining down on your head.

Also, make sure to play Inch by Inch and all the other modes again before they’re cycled back out on October 21.
